description: Object detection models that have a wide range of applications and can operate on edge devices.
odText: The technology outputs a rectangle enclosing each of objects in the input image, and can be used for detecting where people, faces, cars, signs, etc. are located in the image.
segmentationText: This technology paints areas in the input image with different colors so that each pixel is associated with a category it belongs to.
poseEstimationText: This technique estimates the positions of human joints and major points (neck, shoulders, elbows, wrists, ankles, etc.) and their connections from images.
ClassificationText: This technology recognizes what the input image shows and outputs the category label associated with it.
